\subsection{Detailed Description}
Header file for functions to creating Metal layers and views on S\+DL windows. 

\subsection{Typedef Documentation}
\mbox{\Hypertarget{_s_d_l__metal_8h_a0d6413e2d369fbf22f0a2e4ec15bf412}\label{_s_d_l__metal_8h_a0d6413e2d369fbf22f0a2e4ec15bf412}} 
\index{SDL\_metal.h@{SDL\_metal.h}!SDL\_MetalView@{SDL\_MetalView}}
\index{SDL\_MetalView@{SDL\_MetalView}!SDL\_metal.h@{SDL\_metal.h}}
\subsubsection{\texorpdfstring{SDL\_MetalView}{SDL\_MetalView}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily typedef void$\ast$ \mbox{\hyperlink{_s_d_l__metal_8h_a0d6413e2d369fbf22f0a2e4ec15bf412}{S\+D\+L\+\_\+\+Metal\+View}}}



A handle to a C\+A\+Metal\+Layer-\/backed N\+S\+View (mac\+OS) or U\+I\+View (i\+O\+S/tv\+OS). 

\begin{DoxyNote}{Note}
This can be cast directly to an N\+S\+View or U\+I\+View. 
\end{DoxyNote}


\subsection{Function Documentation}
\mbox{\Hypertarget{_s_d_l__metal_8h_a3dad1f90d67b2e72ec2f5bfc9e20f54c}\label{_s_d_l__metal_8h_a3dad1f90d67b2e72ec2f5bfc9e20f54c}} 
\index{SDL\_metal.h@{SDL\_metal.h}!SDL\_Metal\_CreateView@{SDL\_Metal\_CreateView}}
\index{SDL\_Metal\_CreateView@{SDL\_Metal\_CreateView}!SDL\_metal.h@{SDL\_metal.h}}
\subsubsection{\texorpdfstring{SDL\_Metal\_CreateView()}{SDL\_Metal\_CreateView()}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily D\+E\+C\+L\+S\+P\+EC \mbox{\hyperlink{_s_d_l__metal_8h_a0d6413e2d369fbf22f0a2e4ec15bf412}{S\+D\+L\+\_\+\+Metal\+View}} S\+D\+L\+C\+A\+LL S\+D\+L\+\_\+\+Metal\+\_\+\+Create\+View (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{\mbox{\hyperlink{_s_d_l__video_8h_a55a196c7d3b8497538632c79ae1e6392}{S\+D\+L\+\_\+\+Window}} $\ast$}]{window }\end{DoxyParamCaption})}



Create a C\+A\+Metal\+Layer-\/backed N\+S\+View/\+U\+I\+View and attach it to the specified window. 

On mac\+OS, this does {\itshape not} associate a M\+T\+L\+Device with the C\+A\+Metal\+Layer on its own. It is up to user code to do that.

The returned handle can be casted directly to a N\+S\+View or U\+I\+View. To access the backing C\+A\+Metal\+Layer, call \mbox{\hyperlink{_s_d_l__metal_8h_a34b999c8bf37f299f6a5d8a7763589ed}{S\+D\+L\+\_\+\+Metal\+\_\+\+Get\+Layer()}}.

\begin{DoxyNote}{Note}
{\itshape window} must be created with the S\+D\+L\+\_\+\+W\+I\+N\+D\+O\+W\+\_\+\+M\+E\+T\+AL flag.
\end{DoxyNote}
\begin{DoxySeeAlso}{See also}
\mbox{\hyperlink{_s_d_l__metal_8h_a262167b535f38dd12f022df81fddb8f5}{S\+D\+L\+\_\+\+Metal\+\_\+\+Destroy\+View}} 

\mbox{\hyperlink{_s_d_l__metal_8h_a34b999c8bf37f299f6a5d8a7763589ed}{S\+D\+L\+\_\+\+Metal\+\_\+\+Get\+Layer}}

\mbox{\Hypertarget{_s_d_l__metal_8h_a262167b535f38dd12f022df81fddb8f5}\label{_s_d_l__metal_8h_a262167b535f38dd12f022df81fddb8f5}} 
\index{SDL\_metal.h@{SDL\_metal.h}!SDL\_Metal\_DestroyView@{SDL\_Metal\_DestroyView}}
\index{SDL\_Metal\_DestroyView@{SDL\_Metal\_DestroyView}!SDL\_metal.h@{SDL\_metal.h}}
\subsubsection{\texorpdfstring{SDL\_Metal\_DestroyView()}{SDL\_Metal\_DestroyView()}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily D\+E\+C\+L\+S\+P\+EC void S\+D\+L\+C\+A\+LL S\+D\+L\+\_\+\+Metal\+\_\+\+Destroy\+View (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{\mbox{\hyperlink{_s_d_l__metal_8h_a0d6413e2d369fbf22f0a2e4ec15bf412}{S\+D\+L\+\_\+\+Metal\+View}}}]{view }\end{DoxyParamCaption})}



Destroy an existing S\+D\+L\+\_\+\+Metal\+View object. 

This should be called before S\+D\+L\+\_\+\+Destroy\+Window, if S\+D\+L\+\_\+\+Metal\+\_\+\+Create\+View was called after S\+D\+L\+\_\+\+Create\+Window.

\begin{DoxySeeAlso}{See also}
\mbox{\hyperlink{_s_d_l__metal_8h_a3dad1f90d67b2e72ec2f5bfc9e20f54c}{S\+D\+L\+\_\+\+Metal\+\_\+\+Create\+View}} 
\end{DoxySeeAlso}
\mbox{\Hypertarget{_s_d_l__metal_8h_a57af6bc34b5686963397add6e383eb17}\label{_s_d_l__metal_8h_a57af6bc34b5686963397add6e383eb17}} 
\index{SDL\_metal.h@{SDL\_metal.h}!SDL\_Metal\_GetDrawableSize@{SDL\_Metal\_GetDrawableSize}}
\index{SDL\_Metal\_GetDrawableSize@{SDL\_Metal\_GetDrawableSize}!SDL\_metal.h@{SDL\_metal.h}}
\subsubsection{\texorpdfstring{SDL\_Metal\_GetDrawableSize()}{SDL\_Metal\_GetDrawableSize()}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily D\+E\+C\+L\+S\+P\+EC void S\+D\+L\+C\+A\+LL S\+D\+L\+\_\+\+Metal\+\_\+\+Get\+Drawable\+Size (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{\mbox{\hyperlink{_s_d_l__video_8h_a55a196c7d3b8497538632c79ae1e6392}{S\+D\+L\+\_\+\+Window}} $\ast$}]{window,  }\item[{int $\ast$}]{w,  }\item[{int $\ast$}]{h }\end{DoxyParamCaption})}



Get the size of a window\textquotesingle{}s underlying drawable in pixels (for use with setting viewport, scissor \& etc). 


\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em window} & S\+D\+L\+\_\+\+Window from which the drawable size should be queried \\
\hline
{\em w} & Pointer to variable for storing the width in pixels, may be N\+U\+LL \\
\hline
{\em h} & Pointer to variable for storing the height in pixels, may be N\+U\+LL\\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
This may differ from \mbox{\hyperlink{_s_d_l__video_8h_a5cbfffcfec91c22a7ca95fd1d5163db5}{S\+D\+L\+\_\+\+Get\+Window\+Size()}} if we\textquotesingle{}re rendering to a high-\/\+D\+PI drawable, i.\+e. the window was created with S\+D\+L\+\_\+\+W\+I\+N\+D\+O\+W\+\_\+\+A\+L\+L\+O\+W\+\_\+\+H\+I\+G\+H\+D\+PI on a platform with high-\/\+D\+PI support (Apple calls this \char`\"{}\+Retina\char`\"{}), and not disabled by the {\ttfamily S\+D\+L\+\_\+\+H\+I\+N\+T\+\_\+\+V\+I\+D\+E\+O\+\_\+\+H\+I\+G\+H\+D\+P\+I\+\_\+\+D\+I\+S\+A\+B\+L\+ED} hint.

\begin{DoxyNote}{Note}
On mac\+OS high-\/\+D\+PI support must be enabled for an application by setting N\+S\+High\+Resolution\+Capable to true in its Info.\+plist.
\end{DoxyNote}
